content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ there s something so magical about waking up on christmas morning and finding a festive stocking filled with goodies and making my own stocking is one of my favorite ways to add handmade charm to my home plus the best part is that this beautiful design is a quick and easy project that you can whip up in no time so get your crochet hooks and christmas spirit ready because a memorable and cozy holiday season is just one granny hexagon away our granny hexagon stocking comes with a full pattern and a helpful video tutorial following along has never been easier > get ready for some crochet fun with > the very merry tweedmas cal hannah > michelle and i are so excited to > celebrate the holidays with you with > our merry little cal you ll have the > chance to learn new stitches and > techniques while creating beautiful > holiday-inspired pieces so grab your > crochet hooks and join in the > excitement > > all of the designs in the very merry > tweedmas collection were created with > a simple and fresh take on the > traditional granny square that you ll > love while this classic crochet > technique may bring to mind images of > your grandmother s cozy blankets it s > time to turn up the excitement with a > fresh twist imagine the dazzling > potential of combining different > colors and textures creating a > stunning masterpiece that is anything > but outdated and with christmas > rapidly approaching what better time > to dive into this craft and create > some holiday gifts for your loved > ones > > get ready to learn new crochet > techniques and create beautiful and > festive projects that will last a > lifetime join us and let s crochet > together > https //www hanjancrochet com/granny-christmas-crochet-along/ join our vibrant community of crochet lovers and embark on a holly jolly crochet-along journey there are two choices of granny hexagons crochet 12 per stocking then we will join with a flat slip_stitch and add a special ribbing at the top last top it off with a leather hanging strap and a christmas tree ornament for extra charm ✨ extra support & tips ✨ ✔️ video tutorials linked on youtube ✔️ join a community of crocheters ✨ what you will need to make a granny hexagon stocking✨ yarn brava tweed worsted 1 97% premium acrylic 3% viscose 218yds/100g weight 4 worsted colorways shown wren wasabi & mink yarn quantities traditional 1 skein each wren wasabi & mink puff 2 skeins wren 1 skein mink yarn substitutions listed in pattern notions scissors 2 yarn needle 3 removable stitch marker 4 wood blocking board 5 wooden beads 6 cinnamon stick 7 or regular stick string 8 crochet hook g 4
